name: WebGLRenderingContext.depthFunc
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.depthFunc() method of the WebGL API specifies a function that compares incoming pixel depth to the current depth buffer value.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'depthFunc' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.description: The definition of 'glDepthFunc' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
